edu.biu.protocols.yao.offlineOnline.specs

Class OfflineProtocolP1

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.biu.protocols.yao.offlineOnline.specs.OfflineProtocolP1

  • public class OfflineProtocolP1
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the first party in the offline phase of Malicious Yao protocol.

    The full protocol specification is described in "Blazing Fast 2PC in the "Offline/Online Setting with Security for Malicious Adversaries" paper by Yehuda Lindell and Ben Riva, page 18 - section E, "The Full Protocol Specification".

    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Asaf Cohen)

        mainExecution - Parameters of the main circuit.
        crExecution - Parameters of the cheating recovery circuit.

        communication - Configuration of communication between parties.
